Jx.Plugin.Panel.Notifier

Extends: Jx.Plugin

Panel.Form plugin for displaying error messages using a Jx.Notifier instance.

Summary
Jx.Plugin.Panel.NotifierExtends: Jx.Plugin
Options
notifierTypeThe type of notifier to use.
Functions
detach

Options

notifierType

The type of notifier to use.  Either ‘float’ or ‘inline’.  Default is ‘inline’ which places the notifier at the top of the form.

Functions

detach

detach: function()
Extend: Jx.Object
detach: function()
Extends: Jx.ListView
